model

Class GameWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Observable
      • model.GameWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGameWorld

    public class GameWorld
extends Observable
implements IGameWorld
    The model component of the racer game.
    Author:
    Robert Wilk

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  GameWorld.MapViewIterator
      A special iterator for the map view that gives only IDrawable objects to protect the game objects the iterator exposes.
      private static class  GameWorld.Size
      Enumerated size values for game objects which have a range of valid sizes.
      private static class  GameWorld.Speed
      Enumerated speed values for game objects which are movable.
      private static class  GameWorld.Strategy
      Enumerated strategy values.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Number of elapsed "ticks" in the game.

      Integer used to determine which npc should be damaged in round-robin fashion.

      The default amount of damage done to the player's car due to collision (car).

      Container for all game objects.

      Number of lives (game attempts).

      A list of locations for the pylons.

      The x/y limits of the game world.

      Player reference to avoid having to iterate the collection to find the player.

      The length of the player's car.
      private static int PLAYER_MAX_SPEED
      The player's max speed.

      The width of the player's car.

      Comparator to order pylons by sequence number.

      Number of pylons that make up the track.
      private java.util.ArrayList<ISelectable> selected
      List of all the selected game objects at a given time.
      private boolean soundOn
      Is the sound on.
      private int ticks
      Counter to determine if a second has passed.
